oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Letter from Pvt. James Long, Co. E, 5th Ky. Cav., USA
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Letter from Pvt. James Long, Co. E. 5th Ky. Cav., USA, to friend "Amos" reporting the capture of a Confederate captain iand lieutenant near Chattanooga during a foraging expedition. Long describes approaching a house and finding one officer drunk. Long and his comrades ordered the second officer to surrender. After asking three times "a young half dressed female came out and begged us not to shot her." Entering the room, Long encountered a "stark naked" man who "turned out to be a rebel Captain."
